body_html:
@RylanSchaeffer I've edited Eugene's comment to provide the correct link. I guess one thing you can do is to try changing the code as he's described, to see if that helps with your immediate problem.

If not, a minimal reproducible program will still be useful for us to track down what other issues there might be.

@alextp @josh11b since this seems to be a problem with Eager mode, can one of you take a look at the problem, and Eugene's suggested fix? Thanks!
